scripts.static:frontend: python -c "import socket; s=socket.socket(); s.bind(('', 0)); port=s.getsockname()[1]; s.close(); print(port)" > /tmp/frontend_port && PORT=$(cat /tmp/frontend_port) && echo "Starting server on port $PORT" && cd frontend && python -m http.server $PORT
scripts.open:browser: sleep 1s && PORT=$(cat /tmp/frontend_port) && echo "Opening browser at http://localhost:$PORT" && npx open-cli http://localhost:$PORT
scripts.start: npm run open:browser & concurrently --kill-others --handle-input -n python:backend,static:frontend -c green,cyan "npm run python:backend" "npm run static:frontend"
